author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

Changed key 'type' to 'read_type' in UDP message from StatisticsSenderService. This is needed to avoid a naming clash with a 3rd party library used by the workflow system.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.

backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42060
title: Changed 'type' to 'read_type' to avoid keyword class in UDP message [10_6]
